post.body: Man, people were using "brave choice" without kidding? Geez.
OMG WHATS UR NUMBER SO I CAN SEND A NYE TEXT??!??!?
Re: DriWater... I was so certain that was fake, when the page loaded. They're not kidding. Odd.
via @paleofuture: Andrew Keen says internet access leads to facism. Bwa-huh? http://tinyurl.com/4u39zv
Something in which I don't believe: Replying to all on a multiple recipient email. 9 out of 10, whoever sent it gets my message, that's it.
Also: 80s British new wave on Pandora. Is this now being old if you were born in the 1970s?
Oh dear god.
OLD FASHIONEDS AND SCRABBLE! FIRST SATURDAY 2009! WOOOOO!!!!
BEST JOKES OF 2008: http://tinyurl.com/9sgbp7
You know, I think I like the cello a lot. Didn't really occur to me until just now.
The Mark Twain branch of the Detroit Public Library- http://detroitfunk.com/?p=1108
Oh, I'm reading a The City Desk submission that is a DELIGHT.
All 500+ Manhattan landmarks on the Nat'l Register of Hist. Places, blogged. http://epicharmus.com/masterpiece/
Holy cow, I finally finished "The Power Broker" after taking breaks several times over the course of a year. That is a dense, dense read.
Well. Office is completely empty. Guess I'll head out, now.
Borders gift card + Borders coupon= Robert Moses' New Year's Rockin' Eve: http://tinyurl.com/a5ldey
New Wasted Words podcast- 2008 psychic predictions! A flashback! Old Spice! Resolutions! Listen! http://tinyurl.com/8lwoxb
With the better mic, I realize the problem may be that my being a doofus with a mouthful of marbles may not be good for audio-based content.
Done editing the program. The host is tired. It is midnight and junk.
I do not think that I will ever finish editing this episode of Wasted Words. Why a flashback? Why the sound effects?
